subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: A fierce headwind and slashing rain made the third stage of the Tour de France more difficult for a breakaway of four riders who finished more than 2 minutes ahead of the peloton.
snippet: A fierce headwind and slashing rain made the third stage of the Tour de France more difficult for a breakaway of four riders who finished more than 2 minutes ahead of the peloton.
